an10.106:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these ten grounds for wearing away.
an10.106:1.3: For one of right view, wrong view is worn away.
an10.106:1.4: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong view are worn away.
an10.106:1.5: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

an10.106:11.1: These are the ten grounds for wearing away.”
